abstract: Public reaction forced the drug manufacturer to ends its lobbying efforts in state legislatures on behalf of a cervical cancer vaccine.
snippet: Public reaction forced the drug manufacturer to ends its lobbying efforts in state legislatures on behalf of a cervical cancer vaccine.
lead_paragraph: Reacting to a furor from some parents, advocacy groups and public health experts, Merck said yesterday that it would stop lobbying state legislatures to require the use of its new cervical cancer vaccine.

headline.main: Merck to Halt Lobbying for Vaccine for Girls
headline.print_headline: Lobbying For Vaccine To Be Halted

byline.original: By Andrew Pollack and Stephanie Saul
